Title: Establishes a carpet stewardship program
Summary: Establishes a carpet stewardship program; requires manufacturers to coordinate with wholesalers, retailers and installers to recycle old carpets; provides penalties for noncompliance.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 32 §§27-3201 - 27-3223, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing a carpet stewardship program
